title: (x) Jose Cuervo logo - custom drawn (similar to Old English) {Stephen}
content: its me again...I've got another font identification problem which i need expert help on. Does anyone know wether this logo uses a font exactly or wether its based on a font but hand-tooled? ![joseLogo](http://web.archive.org/web/20110403051427im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/69653.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
Hi Kath. As a logo, this is almost certainly hand drawn, but you   
can get pretty close with an " [Old English](http://web.archive.org/web/20110403051427/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&startrow=1&records=20&currpage=1&totalrecords=15&searchby=&searchID=&searchletter=&searchstr=old+english&font_categories_checkbox=font_name_search&fontRendererText=Jose+Cuervo)".
